edw-ZOpenArchives
=================

2010-10-07::

    OAIToken's are no longer used, deprecated in favor of query based tokens
    Ex::
        resuptionToken=prefix,offset,set,from,until
        resuptionToken=oai_dc,100,SomeSet,2001-01-01,2010-01-01
        or:
        resuptionToken=oai_dc,100,,,,
